posts.post_content:
Looking to upgrade my T205 beaters with Good, G/VG or VG with no paper loss, holes, scrapes or writing.  

Trade/For Sale link:  [url]www.imageevent.com/brailey/cardsforsale[/url]
Please contact me at [url]mikebrailey@yahoo.com[/url]

Here are the cards I'm looking for:
Archer
Bell
Bridwell
Chase (left ear only)
Collins (mouth open)
Crandall ("t" not crossed)
Evans
Grant
Hoffman
Leifield (AP variant)
Moran (with stray line)
Oakes
Tannehill
Thomas, Ira
Wilhelm
Wiltse (1 ear)

Trade/For Sale link:  [url]www.imageevent.com/brailey/cardsforsale[/url]

Please contact me at [url]mikebrailey@yahoo.com[/url]

Thanks for helping,
Mike
